item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, May 31, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:

22. C++ to Rust Phrasebook (52 points | 4 comments)

27. Google Duo will be replaced by Google Meet in Sept 2025 (17 points | 20 comments)

29. Silicon Valley finally has a big electronics retailer again: Micro Center opens (226 points | 117 comments)
30. Anthropic launches a voice mode for Claude (99 points | 25 comments)
